Package src.main.java.services

Class WeeklyReviewByRevenueImpl

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.services.WeeklyReviewByRevenueImpl
public class WeeklyReviewByRevenueImpl
extends java.lang.Object
This is a service class that implement all the calculation for PPC1 Calculator.
Version:
Java15
Author:
{CHAN, Chun Wai Tommy, LUK, Chun San Marco, YIU, Ka Ho Alex}, Github id: {iawiawiaw, csluk2001, AcupOfHappiness}

  • Constructor Details

    • WeeklyReviewByRevenueImpl

      public WeeklyReviewByRevenueImpl​(int labourConsumptionOfRose, int labourConsumptionOfNoir, int grapeConsumptionOfRose, int grapeConsumptionOfNoir)
      Constructs an instance of the WeeklyReviewByRevenueImpl class with the specified labour and grape consumption values.
      Parameters:
      labourConsumptionOfRose - the consumption of labour required to produce one litre of Rose wine
      labourConsumptionOfNoir - the consumption of labour required to produce one litre of Noir wine
      grapeConsumptionOfRose - the consumption of grapes required to produce one litre of Rose wine
      grapeConsumptionOfNoir - the consumption of grapes required to produce one litre of Noir wine

  • Method Details

    • optimalMixOfWines

      public OptimalSalesRevenueModel optimalMixOfWines​(float PrcRosePrice, float PrcNoirPrice, int capLabour, int capGrape)
      Calculates the optimal mix of wines based on the prices of Rose and Noir wines, and labour and grape capacity by integer linear programming.
      Parameters:
      PrcRosePrice - the price of one litre of Rose wine
      PrcNoirPrice - the price of one litre of Noir wine
      capLabour - the capacity of labour
      capGrape - the capacity of grape
      Returns:
      an instance of OptimalSalesRevenueModel that represents the optimal mix of wines and the associated sales revenue

    • labourAndGrapeSurplus

      public int[] labourAndGrapeSurplus​(int optimalLitresOfRose, int optimalLitresOfNoir, int capacityOfLabour, int capacityOfGrape)
      Calculates the surplus of labour and grape resources after production
      Parameters:
      optimalLitresOfRose - The optimal litres of rose wine
      optimalLitresOfNoir - The optimal litres of noir wine
      capacityOfLabour - The production capacity of labour
      capacityOfGrape - The production capacity of grape
      Returns:
      An integer array with the labour surplus at index 0 and grape surplus at index 1

    • wineProductionCapacityOverloadedOnGrape

      public boolean wineProductionCapacityOverloadedOnGrape​(int optRose, int optNoir, int MAX_PRODUCTION_CAPACITY_PER_WEEK)
      Checks if the wine production capacity is overloaded on grape
      Parameters:
      optRose - The optimal litres of rose wine
      optNoir - The optimal litres of noir wine
      MAX_PRODUCTION_CAPACITY_PER_WEEK - The maximum production capacity per week
      Returns:
      true if the actual production capacity is less than the sum of optimal litres of rose and noir wines, false otherwise

    • grapeResourceUtilizationIsInsufficientDueToInsufficientLabourSupplied

      public boolean grapeResourceUtilizationIsInsufficientDueToInsufficientLabourSupplied​(int optRose, int optNoir, int capGrape)
      Checks if the grape resource utilization is insufficient due to insufficient labour supplied
      Parameters:
      optRose - The optimal litres of rose wine
      optNoir - The optimal litres of noir wine
      capGrape - The production capacity of grape
      Returns:
      true if the consumption of grapes is less than 90% of the given capacity due to insufficient labour supplied, false otherwise
